CustomBehavior.Text: Every item for this set drops in normal dungeons.

CustomBehavior.Code: Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: Going to Outlands!");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're a Mage! Teleporting to Shattrath.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: Hearthing would be faster to reach our destination, attempting to Hearth!");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: Hearthing would be faster, but our Hearthstone is on cooldown. Attempting to Astrall Recall!");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: Hearthing would be faster, but our Hearthstone is on cooldown. Attempting to Innkeeper's Daughter!");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Pandaria, using the Shrine portal to Outlands.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Northerend, using the Dalaran portal to Stormwind.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're a in Azuyremyst Isle, using the Exodar portal to Outlands.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Kalimdor, using the Ratchet boat to Booty Bay.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Deepholm, using the portal for Stormwind.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Draenor, using the Ashran portal to Stormwind.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Eastern Kingdoms, using the Stormwind portal to Outlands.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're a Mage! Teleporting to Shattrath.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: Hearthing would be faster to reach our destination, attempting to Hearth!");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: Hearthing would be faster, but our Hearthstone is on cooldown. Attempting to Astrall Recall!");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: Hearthing would be faster, but our Hearthstone is on cooldown. Attempting to Innkeeper's Daughter!");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Pandaria, using the Shrine portal to Shattrath.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Northerend, using the Dalaran portal to Orgrimmar.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Eastern Kingdoms, using the Undercity Zeppelin to Kalimdor.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Draenor, using the Ashran portal to Orgrimmar.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Deepholm, using the portal for Orgrimmar.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We're in Kalimdor, taking the Orgrimmar portal to Outlands.");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: We have reached Outlands!");

CustomBehavior.Text: Going to Hellfire to get the Gloves.
Going to Slavepens for the Belt and Shoulder.

If.Condition: HasItem(24366) && HasItem(24360) && HasItem(24465) && HasItem(27414) && HasItem(25941) && HasItem(24022) && HasItem(24090)

CustomBehavior.Text: All items have been obtained!\nThere's no dungeons that drop heroic items for this set.
